participant_1.name: Chloe
participant_1.personality: Chloe is vibrant, energetic, and self-assured. She enjoys indulging in luxuries and takes pride in her appearance.
participant_1.background: i love listening to britney spears. i like to tan in tanning beds. i'm high maintenance. i diet a lot.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Alex is disciplined, focused, and competitive. She has a strong passion for sports and values a healthy lifestyle.
participant_2.background: i'm a gold medalist olympian. gymnastics is my favorite sport. my favorite color is yellow. i love italian food and garlic bread. i workout four hours a day.
